headline: D.R. Horton, Inc. (DHI) Isn’t A Short Squeeze, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks That Jim Cramer Recently Talked About. D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. D.R. Horton, Inc. (NYSE:DHI) is an American home building company whose shares jumped by a strong 17% in July after the firm reported its fiscal third quarter earnings. The report saw […]

headline: D.R. Horton Colorado Launches Arcadia, a New Home Community in Denver
summary: DENVER, CO / ACCESS Newswire / July 29, 2025 / The D.R. Horton Colorado division is pleased to welcome homebuyers to Arcadia, a new paired home community located in Denver's Dayton Triangle neighborhood, which is now open for sales. The team recently ...

headline: D.R. Horton’s Q2 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: D.R. Horton’s second quarter results were well received by the market as the company exceeded Wall Street’s revenue and profit expectations despite a year-over-year decline in sales. Management attributed outperformance to disciplined incentive use, effective inventory management, and a strong operational focus at the community level. CEO Paul Romanowski noted, “Our operators at a community level managed their incentives to drive results,” helping maintain a stable closing pace in a challenging
